related_questions.question:
This text is for question numbers 14-17    My Neighbour
Mr. And Mrs. Ruslan are my neighbors. They have two children,
a son and a daughter. Their names are Fahril and Mayada. Mr. Ruslan is a lecturer in
a state university in our town. Mrs. Ruslanis a house wife. She likes cooking many kinds
of food. She often invites me to cook together in her kitchen. Mr. Ruslan's family has some
pets. There are some birds, a cat and two rabits. I sometimes feed them. I like guing there
because they are kind and friendly. They always show good attitude to everyone.
14. Does Ruslan's family live far from the writer's house?
a. Yes, they do
c. Yes, it does
b. No, they do not
d. No, it doesn't
15. Where does Mr. Ruslan work? He works in a.....
a. University
c. kitchen
b. school
d. company
16. I sometimes feed them. The underlined word means.......
a. ask food to somebody or something
b.give food to somebody or something
C. eat food with somebody
d. take food froom somebody
17. " she ofteninvites me to cook together in her kitchen."The word "me" refers to.....
a, the teacher
c. Mayada
c. the writer
d. Mr. Ruslan​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

14. b

15. a

16. b

17. c

Penjelasan:

i'm not sure about number 14, i'm sorry

Jawaban:

16. A.

17. D.

18. D.

19. A.

related_questions.question: Air hujan yang meresap kedalam tanah dapat membantu proses​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Proses air tanah

Air hujan turun membasahi tanah. Tanah dengan banyak tumbuhan di atasnya memiliki pori-pori, rongga, atau celah bagi air hujan.Air hujan meresap hingga kedalaman beberapa puluh meter.

Penjelasan:

Air yang terserap ke tanah akan terus bergerak hingga mencapai lapisan tertentu.

Ketika sampai di lapisan batuan yang padat, air tak bisa lewat dan mengisi rongga-rongga di sekitar atau di atasnya.

Air yang tersimpan di dalam tanah itu yang disebut dengan air tanah.Jumlah air yang meresap ke dalam tanah sangat bergantung pada jenis tanah dan batuannya.

Untuk bisa mengakses air tanah, perlu dibangun sumur. Tinggi air sumur menunjukkan tinggi muka air tanah.
Jawaban:air hujan yang meresap ke dalam tanah bisa membantu proses tumbuhan/perkembangan tumbuhan akan cepat tumbuh
